description.value:
This long, gnarled staff looks like several bones fused together, then wrapped tightly with strips of desiccated, gray skin. At the top of the staff, a clump of sinew clasps a small stone orb resembling a large human eye. When the staff is activated, this eye twitches and glances around randomly. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Activate@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell}

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Read Aura]{Read Aura}
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}
  • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Darkvision]{Darkvision}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Flaming Sphere]{Flaming Sphere} (creates what appears to be a large eye made of fire), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility]{See Invisibility}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Organsight]{Organsight}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Web of Eyes]{Web of Eyes}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Clairvoyance]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Countless Eyes]{Countless Eyes}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Scrying]{Detect Scrying}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

source.value: Pathfinder Adventure: Crown of the Kobold King
